actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to provide, for purposes of computing retired pay for members of the Armed Forces, an additional credit of service equal to all periods of time spent by any such member as a prisoner of war.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Grants to members of the Armed Forces, for purposes of computing retired pay for members of the Armed Forces, an additional credit of service equal to all periods of time spent by any such members as a prisoner of war.

titles.title: A bill to provide, for purposes of computing retired pay for members of the Armed Forces, an additional credit of service equal to all periods of time spent by any such member as a prisoner of war.
